sense.def:
A shout
je glasen vzklik ali klic.

seg.quote: Excited shouts and laughter could be heard from the garden.

sense.def:
To shout
pomeni govoriti na ves glas, tako da se sliši daleč naokoli.

seg.quote: The children on the sand were shouting with excitement.

sense.def:
To shout someone down
pomeni kričati na nekoga, ki govori, tako da nihče ne more slišati, kaj pravi.

seg.quote: Mr Healey was shouted down at a meeting in Birmingham.
